descriptions:
['DescriptionSE7EN RESIDENCES re-branded as SEVEN PALM 
BEACHFRONT APARTMENTS ON PALM JUMEIRAH 
Seven Palm embodies urban island living close to the center of Dubai. Nestled in between five-star DUKES The Palm and Oceana Residences on one side and Fairmont The Palm on the other. Walking distance to Nakheel Shopping Mall, Monorail stations, Al Itihad Park and Golden Mile Gallery.
Seven Palm offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Ocean, Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and the Dubai Eye. 
A luxury hotel will be situated in the South tower of the Seven Palm project and the residences are located in the North tower. The towers are joined at the top by a stunning one-of-a-kind infinity pool and food and beverage outlets catering to the wants and needs of residents and visitors alike. 
Studio apartments feature high quality furnishings maximizing space with flat screen televisions, fully equipped kitchens and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Imagine relaxed living in an exceptional one, two or three bedroom apartment featuring high quality furnishings, separate air-conditioning controls, flat screen televisions in the living and master bedroom, guest toilet, en-suite master bedroom, walk-in wardrobes, fully equipped kitchens and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Duplex penthouses feature private terraces with swimming pools and access to the rooftop infinity swimming pool. Both penthouses have bright open layouts and can be fitted out to your own taste. 
Amenities include an Olympic size rooftop infinity pool in length, fully equipped gymnasium, beach access, lush landscaped gardens and secure underground parking. 
This project is sold off-plan with expected completion due by Q4 – 2020 to all nationalities on a freehold ownership basis.
Visit our sales office located at DUKES The Palm Hotel or call us for your exclusive viewing TODAY!']

descriptions:
['Descriptionfam Properties is pleased to present this large, Duplex Penthouse in Marina Residence, Palm Jumeirah.
This beautiful penthouse sits on approx 10,254 sqft and is very well maintained. The uni has beautiful white marble flooring throughout! Upon entering you are welcomed by a well sized hall way leading onto the reception with panoramic windows. The kitchen has all appliances inc. The property offers 4 double bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, plus maids room, all having their own balcony inc guest bedroom. New owners can enjoy and entertain guests with the penthouses cinema room, large terrace area with spectacular views of the Sea, Marina Skyline and of course Palm Jumeirah.
Marina Residence This opulent development of 6 freehold high rises is distinctively Arabian in design and color, yet with the trappings of the glamorous French Riviera or Mediterranean coast; the exclusive playgrounds of the rich & the famous. Ideal for relaxation & entertaining, Marina Residences features elegant two and three bedroom apartments, penthouses & townhouses of exceptional interiors and classic / contemporary finishes. All properties incorporate ""future technology-ready"" elements as well as branded appliances. The towers of Marina Residences repose on landscaped podiums to form a ""v"" pattern and open into Anchor Marina. With berths for over 700 vessels, an elegant clubhouse & 5-star yacht facilities, Anchor Marina sets the tone of life at Marina Residences, Dubai. The Palm Jumeirah is beyond doubt, a glittering testimony to the will and vision of the people of Dubai. Often called the 8th wonder of the world, this man-made island has blossomed into a highly coveted and valuable real estate development. Owing to its sheer scale, beauty and innovation.
